author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE WEAKENS SOME MORE STILL HEADING WEST-NORTHWEST TOWARD THE THE DATE LINE...
summary:
...HONE WEAKENS SOME MORE STILL HEADING WEST-NORTHWEST TOWARD THE THE DATE LINE...
 As of 5:00 AM HST Thu Aug 29
 the center of Hone was located near 21.0, -171.9
 with movement WNW at 9 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
